subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Greg Biffle was cruising around Las Vegas Motor Speedway at 204 miles an hour when his racecar’s tire exploded, sending him crashing into the wall. Knocked unconscious, he dislocated his right shoulder and briefly had blurred vision.
snippet: Greg Biffle was cruising around Las Vegas Motor Speedway at 204 miles an hour when his racecar’s tire exploded, sending him crashing into the wall. Knocked unconscious, he dislocated his right shoulder and briefly had blurred vision.
